name: UP883772 - Asteroids but you're the asteroid
name_original: UP883772 - Asteroids but you're the asteroid
description:
This is a Asteroids clone made using GameMaker Studio 2 by following tutorial by Shaun Spalding on YouTube. This has been amended, added to and arranged to allow you to play as the asteroid versus a fleet of enemy ships. The game and its data are within the zip folder. Enjoy.

Fight for the glory of the asteroid belt and destroy as many ships as possible!
